name: BNNSLayerParametersPadding
desc: A structure that contains the parameters of a padding layer.

items.name: init(i_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, o_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, padding_size: ((Int, Int), (Int, Int), (Int, Int), (Int, Int), (Int, Int), (Int, Int), (Int, Int), (Int, Int)), padding_mode: BNNSPaddingMode, padding_value: UInt32)
items.desc: Returns a new padding-layer parameters structure from the specified parameters.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a new padding-layer parameters structure.

items.name: var padding_size: ((Int, Int), (Int, Int), (Int, Int), (Int, Int), (Int, Int), (Int, Int), (Int, Int), (Int, Int))
items.desc: The number of padding elements to add before and after the original data.

items.name: var padding_mode: BNNSPaddingMode
items.desc: The mode the operation uses to pad.

items.name: var padding_value: UInt32
items.desc: The value the operation uses to fill the padding area when the mode is constant.
